definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Step 6: If you cannot open the doors, look for an emergency exit window.
sentences.chinese: 如果無法打開緊急車門，則尋找太平門窗戶。

sentences.english: We left by the rear exit.

sentences.chinese: 這家劇院有六個太平門。

sentences.english: All of them rushed for the exit as soon as they heard the alarm.
sentences.chinese: 聽到報警器響他們都向太平門衝去。

sentences.english: Please locate the nearest emergency exit.
sentences.chinese: 請指明最靠近的太平門位置。

sentences.english: Thellos plane has eight emergency exits. Please locate the exit nearest to you.
sentences.chinese: 本架飛機有八個太平門，請找到離你這段的那個門。

sentences.english: When the film was over, they broke and moved towards the exits.
sentences.chinese: 電影放完時，他們散開後分別往各太平門而去。

definition: Longmen county in Huizhou 惠州[Hui4 zhou1], Guangdong
(coll.) lowest-ranking (student, participant etc)/to rank at the bottom of the list/to finish last
National Games, Chinese athletics competition, organized every four years since 1959
the few are no match for the many/heavily outnumbered/facing impossible odds (idiom)
Wuzhong district of Suzhou city 蘇州市|苏州市[Su1 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
